context_meta.summary: PHOENIX -- Authorities say a man has been arrested for allegedly fatally running over his girlfriend in the parking lot of a Phoenix club in front of her two children. Police say 26-year-old Ricardo Garcia is being held on suspicion of one count of first-degree murder and four counts of aggravated assault. They say 28-year-old Anjelica Moraga died of her injuries at a hospital early Sunday. According to police, Moraga and Garcia argued late Saturday night outside the club and he rammed into his girlfriend's vehicle, causing minor damage.
